meanings.definition: To help the progress or development of something.
meanings.sent1: She furthers her knowledge by reading books.
meanings.sent2: The teacher furthers the students' understanding through interactive lessons.
meanings.sent3: His love for learning furthers his quest for knowledge.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight furthers the growth of the plants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: Practice furthers mastery in any skill.

meanings.definition: To promote or advance a cause or belief.
meanings.sent1: The organization furthers environmental conservation efforts.
meanings.sent2: He furthers his political agenda through public speeches.
meanings.sent3: Her passion for the cause furthers her dedication to making a difference.
meanings.sent4: The new policy furthers equality among all employees.
meanings.sent5: Hard work furthers success in achieving goals.
